# realityFile

**Type Property**

A type that represents a Reality Composer file.

## Declaration

```swift
static var realityFile: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.reality`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeData].

## Apple 3D content

- **sceneKitScene**: A type that represents a SceneKit serialized scene.
- **arReferenceObject**: A type that represents an augmented reality reference object.
